column4: i have wifi set up and i can scan and see my router, but i can't seem to connect. when i set the essid then run dhclient. it scans for a bit then says 'no dhcpoffers' - what could be wrong? there is no key required to connect - any help would be appreciated (im on ubuntu cli system)
are you sure the router's DHCP is on?
im connected wirelessly from 3 other devices at the moment
im connected wirelessly from 3 other devices at the moment - checked my router and yes dhcp is enabled
